title: Amenities you'll LOVE
map_address: 901 Brush Street near Charleston and Decatur
posting_body: ['West Edge offers convenience, comfort, and great value at unbeatable prices.', 'Our beautiful grounds will impress you with tall trees and mature landscaping.', 'Five spacious floor plans are a must-see and offer exceptional value for your dollar.', 'Our residents enjoy numerous amenities such as Playground, Dog Park, park with BBQ and picnic areas, indoor spa, saunas, resident lounge, and game room with billiards.', 'Our goal is to make our residents smile.', 'We are sure we will make you smile too.', 'Welcome Home to West Edge!', 'COMMUNITY AMMENITIES:', '*Computer Station, *Covered Parking *Fitness Center', '*Game Room w/ Billiards *Indoor Spa/ Sauna *5-Laundry Facilities', '*', 'On Call Maintenance *Package Receiving *Courtesy Patrol *Picnic Area with Barbecue *Playground *Dog Park *Swimming Pools', 'RENOVATED APARTMENT FEATURES:', '*All Electric Stainless-Steel Appliances * Thinscape Countertops * 2 Tone decorative walls *', 'Modern LED lighting fixtures throughout * 1st floor wood vinyl flooring throughout * 2nd floor with New Carpet/Vinyl flooring *', 'Decorative baseboards *Vertical Blinds *Private Balconies/Patios', '*Large Closets * Spacious walk-in pantry (Selected units)', '* Wood burning fireplace (in select units)', '* Washer/Dryer', 'In-Unit (Selected units)', 'RENOVATED APARTMENT PRICES:', 'A. 1 Bedroom 1 Bath 680 Sq.', 'Ft. $ 1,150 - $1,160', 'B. 2 Bedroom 1 Bath 890 Sq.', 'Ft. $1,400 - $1,410', 'C. 2 Bedroom 2 Bath 960 Sq.', 'Ft. $1,500 - $ 1510', 'D. 3 Bedroom 2 Bath 1153 Sq.', 'Ft. $1,700 - $1,710', 'E. 3 Bedroom 2 Bath 1445 Sq.', 'Ft. $1,925', '**TO APPLY YOU MUST BRING**:', '-Application Fee $45 per adult (Money Order)', '-Holding Fee $100 (Money Order)', '-Photo ID per applicant (18 yrs. & up)', '-Pay-stubs (Income Verification (30 days)', 'West Edge APARTMENTS', '901 Brush Street Las Vegas, NV 89107', 'Monday- Friday 8:00AM-5:00PM', 'Saturday- Sunday 8:00AM- 5:00PM']
